text: A Fiery Biden, Ignoring Critics, Attacks Trump to Chants of ‘Lock Him Up’  —  Facing rising frustration in his party, the president brushed it off in an energetic speech in Michigan.  Inside the room, at least, the Democratic mood was defiant, with cheers of “Don't go, Joe.”
